result.eng: How did you manage?

result.eng: I managed to reach my destination.
result.ga: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amach

result.html: D'éirigh liom mo cheann scríbe a bhaint amachI managed to reach my destination.

result.eng: He managed to reach a high level.

result.html: D'éirigh leis leibhéal ard a bhaint amachHe managed to reach a high level.

result.eng: I managed to reach the top.

result.orig: D'éirigh liom an barr a bhaint amach

result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ liom an barr a ḃaint amaċI managed to reach the top.

result.eng: I got up at eight in the morning.
result.ga: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidin
result.orig: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidin
result.html: D'éirigh mé ar a hocht a chlog ar maidinI got up at eight in the morning.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ mé ar a hoċt a ċlog ar maidinI got up at eight in the morning.

result.eng: I said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.
result.ga: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-mhoch ar maidin

result.ponchtml: Dúirt mé liom féin go n-éireoinn an-ṁoċ ar maidinI said to myself that I would get up very early in the morning.

result.eng: We haven't managed to get a hold of the Chinese market yet.
result.ga: Níor éirigh linn greim a fháil ar mhargadh na Síne go fóill

result.eng: I didn't succeed in the exam.

result.html: Níor éirigh liom sa scrúdúI didn't succeed in the exam.
result.ponchtml: Níor éiriġ liom sa scrúdúI didn't succeed in the exam.

result.eng: I haven't managed to escape from the meeting.

result.eng: After all the argument, we managed to come to a settlement.
